content: While I’m politically more aligned with Heller, when you take on investors, it’s only commonsense that they’re going to wanna have a “say” in the business, since it’s their money at stake (…duh)! And it’s not like they asked that she post pro-Trump messages, when instead they reasonably and respectfully requested that she simply keep the business politically “neutral”. Which BTW, seems to be an ongoing problem with “gender feminism” these days… the notion that somehow just being female should make some folks “entitled”.
